message.content:
{"id": "109718", "title": "Bug 109718 - Tips show the content in one line when putting large content in text item", "description": "INTRODUCTION 32. SOME OF THE ERROR MESSAGE DOESN'T HAVE ENOUGH INFORMATION FOR USER TO IDENTIFY THE ERROR. 42.5 ADD JAVASCRIPT OBJECT 42.6 SUPPORT DROP IN THE GROUP HEADER 42.7 PROVIDE UNDOABLE TRANSACTION 42.8 USER PROPERTY REVISION 52.9 HELP GUI TO FILTRATE THE UNNECESSARY NOTIFICATIONS 53. ELEMENT EXTENSION 65. Save and put mouse on the text item

Expected Result: Tips show in the given format.
Actual Result: Tips show in one line.", "OB": "When putting large content in text item, the tips should show the content in the given format.", "EB": "The parameter for element name and property name should be provided.", "SR": "To fix this bug:
1. Modify the code to ensure that when large content is put in a text item, the tips are displayed in the correct format.
2. Update the error messages to provide enough information for users to identify the error.
3. Complete the TODO tasks related to adding JavaScript object, supporting drop in the group header, providing undoable transaction, and revising user properties.
4. Review and enhance the message file by removing duplicate error messages.
5. Help the GUI to filter unnecessary notifications.
6. Consider extending the element functionality.
7. Save and test the behavior when putting the mouse on the text item.

Additionally, provide the necessary parameters for element name and property name."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
